title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: Both the dynamic text item and the data/text item should display datetime values in the same format.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a text, data, dynamic text item. 2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
